content.rendered:
Directed by Smeep Kang.

Written by Vaibhav Suman.

Cast Rishi Kapoor(Yograj Singh). Jimmy Shergill(Tommy Pandey). Sunny Singh(Karan Pandey (as Sunny Singh Nijjar)). Omkar Kapoor(Varun Singh). Nimisha Mehta(Riya Mehta). Rucha Vaidya(Sonam). Manoj Joshi(Vinod Mehta). Lillete Dubey(Ruchi Mehta). Rajesh Sharma(Kokey Singh). Gurbachan Singh(Khattar). Rakesh Bedi(Sonam’s Father). Neelu Kohli(Sonam’s Mother). Shobha Singh(Ekta Khera). Sunny Leone(Special Appearance). Ashok Pathak(Tommy Pandey Sidekick). Rohan Rajpoot(Vinod Mehta Servant). Rk Gaurav(Photographer) . Natasa Stankovic(Dancer in song Saturday Night)

Language Hindi.

Producers Syed Imran Ali. Vinay Gupta. Naveen Mathur. Deepak Mukut. Kamal Mukut. Anuj Sharma.

Production Soham Rockstar Entertainment. Shantketan Entertainments. Vinr Films.
